title: Deciving Blue-Wards

replies.body: With ya - we've got a change coming in the next patch that'll give blue trinket wards a somewhat different icon from other wards. They'll still look fairly similar (want to ensure they still read as wards at a glance) but hopefully there'll be enough distinction there to help with cases like this.
I'm terribly sorry for asking here, but are you planning any balance tweaks for Shen?
Is he overpowered on the PBE or something? Haven't been able to play Jhin or him because of their perma banned status or others picking them first :P Custom games are still broken as usual...
The main issue is that his scaling armor got hit a little too hard. His W doesn't feel as impactful as it should and in general Shen feels like he's significantly weaker than before.
We're talking about wards here buddy.
I know. Just hoping I could make this a grab bag, since every time I try to make a post about that subject it gets downvoted to oblivion for reasons unbeknownst to me.
I'm pretty sure there will be.

Excellent point, Riot should fix that.

Bump for visibility!
lol i would love to tp to blue wards it would be so awesome someone is running from team blue ward tp in front of them and cc them down
That's why they don't let you tp to them. Blue wards are too cheap and easy to throw out which would give a lot of locations to tp to.

well, if it exists, but few people noticed, it clearly is a sign that there needs to be done more
There wasn't, which is why it has just been introduced on PBE

I think they should just change the icons, not make them able to be teleported on.

I mean, you can put them very far away and quite often.  It would make it possible to just flank entire teams using only teleport and blue trinket, within the 3 second cast time of tp.
nothing more did i ask for...

Something similar happened to me the other day. I was going to steal the enemies blue from their ramus expecting to shunpo out right after to the blue trinket right behind the wall. I don't need to say how it ended.
They have added such a thing for testing on PBE. the Blue Wards are lighter-teal color-ish and can be distinguished fairly easily imo
